Diabetes
Liver disease
High blood pressure
Obesity
Asthma
Cancer
This #MinorityHealthMonth, let's pledge to reduce racial and ethnic health inequities in the Hispanic community.

html: While we are hearing reports power is back at #MDCbrooklyn we need to keep a close eye to ensure everything is working and proper protocols are followed and backup systems are in place. My thanks again to all the NYers who made your voices heard.
text:
While we are hearing reports power is back at #MDCbrooklyn we need to keep a close eye to ensure everything is working and proper protocols are followed and backup systems are in place. 

My thanks again to all the NYers who made your voices heard.

html: I am happy to report lights are back on at #MDCbrooklyn. I want to thank everyone who showed up to make their voices heard. Now we must follow up to ensure those inside are safe and this never happens again.
text: I am happy to report lights are back on at #MDCbrooklyn. I want to thank everyone who showed up to make their voices heard. Now we must follow up to ensure those inside are safe and this never happens again.

html: The Warden told me that contractors are working and the needed part has been found. Expects power back tonight or tomorrow. Will be watching closely. Already this has gone on unacceptably too long!pic.twitter.com/ZzEY6B7BDk
text:

html: Was at #MDCBrooklyn again today to demand full restoration of heat and power. Visited female detainees who haven't been receiving medication. text:
Was at #MDCBrooklyn again today to demand full restoration of heat and power. Visited female detainees who haven't been receiving medication.
The problem with electricity and heat has been lack of urgency and limited access to a needed part. I am continuing to press for action.pic.twitter.com/RhMQBRHZlf

Will continue to push for action.

html: I appreciate all the elected officials, BK Defenders and concerned NYers who joined together today for not allowing this outrageous behavior to stand. We will keep fighting until this is resolved.
text: I appreciate all the elected officials, BK Defenders and concerned NYers who joined together today for not allowing this outrageous behavior to stand. We will keep fighting until this is resolved.

html: I want to thank my colleague @RepJerryNadler and all the NYers today who joined together to stand for justice and against this inhumane treatment. We will continue pushing for answers and more importantly, swift action.

html: I just called the Director of BOP. He agreed situation is unacceptable and that contractor had left MDC. Given how badly MDC is handling, he agreed to get BOP Regional Director involved. We stressed need to get detainees with medical needs moved.

html: Yep - most at MDC have not yet been convicted of a crime but are pretrial detainees, either held on bail or remanded to custody. Otherwise prisoners there are serving brief sentences.
text: Yep - most at MDC have not yet been convicted of a crime but are pretrial detainees, either held on bail or remanded to custody. Otherwise prisoners there are serving brief sentences.

html: After visiting MDC it appears there is some restored heat, hot water & hot meals being served. Still not at full capacity. Still cold & dark. As we weren't allowed to speak with inmates, unclear if blankets are being distributed. Continuing to monitor this closely.
text:
After visiting MDC it appears there is some restored heat, hot water & hot meals being served. 

Still not at full capacity. 

Still cold & dark. As we weren't allowed to speak with inmates, unclear if blankets are being distributed. 

Continuing to monitor this closely.

html: I'm happy to announce that I've been named the Vice Chair of the @HouseSmallBiz & will serve on the Subcommittee on Investigations, Oversight + Regulations! TY Chair @NydiaVelazquez for your steadfast support & I look forward to us fighting on behalf of #SmallBiz everywhere!
text:
I'm happy to announce that I've been named the Vice Chair of the @HouseSmallBiz & will serve on the Subcommittee on Investigations, Oversight + Regulations!

TY Chair @NydiaVelazquez for your steadfast support & I look forward to us fighting on behalf of #SmallBiz everywhere!

html: .@realDonaldTrump says another #TrumpShutdown is "certainly an option" after the 3-week deadline for negotiations passes. Well, Mr. President, another #TRumpShutDown is NOT an option for the 800,000 workers who just returned from unpaid furlough or worked weeks without pay.
text:
.@realDonaldTrump says another #TrumpShutdown is "certainly an option" after the 3-week deadline for negotiations passes.   

Well, Mr. President, another #TRumpShutDown is NOT an option for the 800,000 workers who just returned from unpaid furlough or worked weeks without pay.
